title: (x) Funky N in "Neelon Properties" logo - ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates {Yves}
content:
Hi there, can can anyone help identify the “Neelon” font in the link below (or tell me if, perhaps, it is a custom design?)

[http://www.neelonproperties.com/graphics/index\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225724/http:/www.neelonproperties.com/graphics/index_logo.gif "http://www.neelonproperties.com/graphics/index\_logo.gif")

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

Bethany

 [‹ (x) Taye Diggs & Idina Menzel squarish sans - Stainless {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225724/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29967 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Looking for an alternative to Eurostile extended - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225724/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29923 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bethany

comments.content: That’s one half of the NT-ligature in ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates.
